sentence.Network_en: Seizures of illicit drugs have increased by 30 % this year.
sentence.Network_cn: 今年违禁药品的扣押增长了30%.

sentence.Network_en: She slipped outside for an illicit cigarette.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语学习小技巧 - 学习点子 ... il- 表示“ 不，非 ” illicit 违法的 licit 合法的.
会计词汇D ... illegal income 不合法收入 Illicit 非法的，禁止的 illicit bankruptcy 违法的破产.
美国法庭词汇翻译 | 法律英语翻译 ... illegitimate child 私生子,非婚生子 illicit 非法 illusory 错觉的.
奥凡西 ... quid pro quo – （拉丁）补偿物；相等物；交换条件；让步条件 illicit – 违法的；不正当的 tag along – 尾随，紧跟.

Illicit 非法的，禁止的illicit bankruptcy 违法的破产Image advertising 形象广告

航海及海运专业词汇英语翻译(I) ... illicit market 黑市 illicit sale 私卖 illicit 非法的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from French, or from Latin illicitus, from in- 'not' + licitus (see licit)

entry.tran: 非法的;违禁的;不正当的
entry.def: An illicit activity or substance is not allowed by law or the social customs of a country.

example.tran: 丹蒂旗帜鲜明地谴责不正当恋情。

example.ex: ...information about the use of illicit drugs.

means.word_mean: 1. contrary to accepted morality (especially sexual morality) or convention;
2. contrary to or forbidden by law;

auth_sentence.content: At lunchtime he takes large quantities of illicit gin.
auth_sentence.res_content: At lunchtime he takes large quantities of illicit gin.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: At lunchtime he takes large quantities of illicit gin.

auth_sentence.content: Underground poker clubs have the lure of the illicit.
auth_sentence.res_content: Underground poker clubs have the lure of the illicit.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Underground poker clubs have the lure of the illicit.

auth_sentence.content: The same for cigarettes and illicit drugs, doctors say.
auth_sentence.res_content: The same for cigarettes and illicit drugs, doctors say.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The same for cigarettes and illicit drugs, doctors say.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"使……,成为,进入,再"; 2. 放在同辅音词根前表示"不,无"

stems_affixes.word_buile: il不,无+legible可读的→adj.难读的,难认的
il不,无+liberal宽大的→adj.气量狭窄的,吝啬的
il不,无+licit合法的, 正当的→adj.违法的,违禁的
il不,无+literate有文化的→adj.不识字的
il不,无+logical逻辑的→adj.不合逻辑的
il使……,成为,进入,再+lus玩弄+ion表名词→被[幻觉]玩弄→幻觉
il使……,成为,进入,再+lumin光+ate表动词→使…光明→说明
il使……,成为,进入,再+lustr=lust光+ate表动词→使…光明→说明
il不+licit合法的, 正当的→adj.违法的,违禁的
licen允许+t+ious……的→允许做[任何事情]→放肆的
licence[[n.自由,放肆]]→n.[licence]许可证,执照 v.准许,认可
licence[[n.自由,放肆]]→n.[licence]许可证,执照 v.准许,认可

means.word_mean: 法律不许可的, 非法的

sentences.en: She slipped outside for an illicit cigarette.
They were prosecuted for illicit liquor selling.
sentences.cn: 他们因私卖烈酒而被起诉。

sentences.en: He had an illicit association with Jane.
sentences.cn: 他和简曾有过不正当关系。
